casebody.data:
Charles DEMICHER, Individually and as Trustee of Sovereign Revocable Trust, Appellant,
v.
LYON CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, INC. and Mary M. Sondgerath, P.A., d/b/a Sondgerath & Associates, P.A., Appellees. Case No. 5D16-3182 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District. Decision filed June 5, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

AFFIRMED.
